metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0357 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A heap-overflow flaw exists in the -tr loader of iucode-tool starting with v1.4 and before v2.1.1, potentially leading to SIGSEGV, or heap corruption.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0357` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

iucode-tool - 1.0.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: iucode-tool package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1').
